name: onbo
title: Onbo - Job Tracker
description: Discover and track New Grad and Internship opportunities from top companies.
author: soradotwav

commands.name: search-jobs
commands.title: Find New Grad Roles
commands.description: Browse and track entry-level opportunities by company and role type.

commands.name: search-internships
commands.title: Find Internships
commands.description: Browse and track internship opportunities by company and role type.

commands.name: applied-roles
commands.title: My Applications
commands.description: View and manage roles you've applied to.

preferences.name: autoSaveOnOpen
preferences.title: Auto-Save on Open/Copy
preferences.description: Automatically save roles to My Applications when you open or copy a listing.
preferences.label: Enable Auto-Save

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
